resources.string: Choose the number that is higher.\nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points.

"Congratulations, level completed!\n Did you know that the number seven is considered the luckiest number. There are seven days in a week, seven continents, seven notes, seven colors of the rainbow and much more. Also, the number seven is the favorite number of most people in the world."
"Choose the Roman numeral that is greater.\nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points."
"Congratulations, level completed!\n Did you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals?"
"Choose the fraction that is larger.\nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points. "
"Congratulations, you've completed the level!\n Did you know that operations with fractions were considered the most difficult area of mathematics in the middle of the century?"
"Choose something edible.\nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points."
"Congratulations, you've completed the level!\n Did you know that many crocodiles swallow stones in order to dive into the water faster and stay on the bottom?"
